title: account suspended
body: Alright i understand that sometimes some people have bad games and they start to troll or just being really stupid.But my real question is when i am playing normally and some kids drives me crazy with their trollings being afk or etc. and when i say something to them i get banned because of my words but why nobody is watching why i am saying bad words and why they are not suspended..

replies.body: When toxicity or foul language is concerned, it doesn't necessarily matter why or what prompted you to say those things, only the fact that you said it. Certain things simply aren't okay. If you do want more context on why this happened, you're welcome to reach out to our player behavior team in a ticket.
